data.description: OO Wrappers for the libneural c++ library
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
it seems pretty obvious that it belongs under the AI root,
    LibNeural would seem to be the most obvious and logical choice for
    it's name as it's intended to be a 1-to-1 mapping of the libneural
    c++ library's object(s) to perl.
